mapper.select: select * from tblcartmain order by cm_code desc
select * from tblcartsub order by cs_code desc
mapper.insert: insert into tblcartsub (cm_code, p_code, cs_cnt) values (#{cm_code}, #{p_code}, #{cs_cnt})
mapper.select: select * from tblcartsub where p_code = #{p_code} and cm_code = #{cm_code}
mapper.update: update tblcartsub set cs_cnt = #{cs_cnt} where cs_code = #{cs_code}
mapper.select: select m.m_name, p.p_name, p.p_price, cm.cm_code, cm.m_id, cs.p_code, cs.cs_cnt, cs.cs_code, p.p_price * cs.cs_cnt as subtotal from tblcartmain cm, tblcartsub cs, tblproduct p, tblmember as m where cm.cm_code = cs.cm_code and p.p_code = cs.p_code and m.m_id = cm.m_id and cm.m_id = #{m_id}
select sum(p.p_price * cs.cs_cnt) Total from tblcartmain cm, tblcartsub cs, tblproduct p where cm.cm_code = cs.cm_code and p.p_code = cs.p_code and cm.m_id = #{m_id}
